text: Armando León Bejarano Valadez (April 11, 1916 - July 6, 2016) was a Mexican orthopedic surgeon, physician, and politician. He was a member of the Institutional Revolutionary Party (PRI). He served as the Governor of Morelos from 1972 until 1982. Bejarano died on July 6, 2016 in Cuernavaca, Morelos from pneumonia, aged 100. ==References== Category:1916 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Mexican politicians Category:Mexican physicians Category:Surgeons Category:People from Morelos
title: Armando León Bejarano
